resources.string: A typical daily calorie intake is around 2500 for men and 2000 for women.
You haven\'t eaten anything yet today!
Hello, time to get some food in you!
You\'ve passed your caloric intake for the day, I think that\'s enough food until tomorrow.
You\'re about %d%% of the way through your daily intake budget.
Required intake was below the minimum and was raised
Required intake was above the maximum and was lowered
Are you sure you want to clear today\'s history? This will also reset today\'s caloric intake.
